message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $11500. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a product that is valued at $12000 but at a discounted rate. Don't miss out on this chance to save while enjoying the benefits of our high-quality product.

I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10800. I'm interested in the product, but I have a budget constraint and need to make sure it fits within my means. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to negotiate further. In light of this, I would like to offer the product at a price of $11000. This still represents a significant discount from its original value, and I believe it will meet your financial considerations while providing you with excellent value for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. However, $11000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $10500. Can you consider this revised offer?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After considering your offer, I am willing to come down to a price of $10750 for the product. This is the lowest price I can go while still maintaining the value and quality of the product. I hope this meets your budget requirements.

I'm getting close to my budget, Alice. I can see you're willing to meet me halfway, but I still need to save a bit more. I'm willing to go up to $10600, but that's my final offer. Can you consider this price?
